About

Anna Blackwood runs Blackwood Gardens, she trained in Garden Design at SRUC in Edinburgh and studied horticulture at RGBE and is a pre-registered member of the Society of Garden designers. Anna is a keen gardener, with a wide plant knowledge. She loves the challenge of transforming outdoor spaces into beautiful, practical gardens loved by their owner. Blackwood Gardens is a design studio operating from East Lothian and working across Scotland. We work in partnership with landscape professionals to deliver quality garden transformations.

Blackwood Gardens | Designing Gardens for you to Love and Enjoy | website March 2023
